summary.para: Checks if a typographic feature is available for a glyph or a set of glyphs.

param.name: fontFace
param.para: The font face to read glyph information from.

param.name: scriptAnalysis
param.para: The script analysis for the script or font to check.

param.name: localeName
param.para: The locale name to check.

param.name: featureTag
param.para: The font feature tag to check.

param.name: glyphCount
param.para: The number of glyphs to check.

param.name: glyphIndices
param.para: An array of glyph indices to check.

param.name: featureApplies
param.para: An array of integers that indicate whether or not the font feature applies to each glyph specified.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: glyphOrientationAngle

param.name: isSideways

Whether the run's glyphs are sideways or not.

param.name: originX

The X value of the baseline origin.

param.name: originY

param.name: transform

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Returns a complete list of OpenType features available for a script or font. If a feature is partially supported, then this method indicates that it is supported.

param.name: fontFace
param.para: Type: *
The font face to get features from.

param.name: scriptAnalysis
param.para: Type:
The script analysis for the script or font to check.

param.name: localeName
param.para: Type: const WCHAR*
The locale name to check.

param.name: maxTagCount
param.para: Type: UINT32
The maximum number of tags to return.

param.name: actualTagCount
param.para: Type: UINT32*
The actual number of tags returned.

param.name: tags
param.para: Type: *
An array of OpenType font feature tags.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
